name: Water
description: I have a filter jar of water (Brita style, if you live in Europe, Google that) and I have never had any problem. I have never done it with tap water, it is drinkable where I live. If you live in a place where it is not safe to drink tap water, please use bottled water.

name: Tea
description: It needs to be either pure green or black tea. Flavored tea contains oils that won't work with Kombutcha

name: Unflitered apple cider vinegar
description: Also called "with the mother", it is essential to keep the acidity levels high to protect the SCOBY from harmful bacteria.

name: SCOBY
description: Stands for Symbiotic Culture of Bacteria and Yeast
